trans-unit.source: Driver Signing Properties
trans-unit.target: Driver Signing Properties

trans-unit.source: When a project is selected in Solution Explorer, the **Properties** dialog under the **Driver Signing** node, displays two sections of properties:
trans-unit.target: When a project is selected in Solution Explorer, the **Properties** dialog under the **Driver Signing** node, displays two sections of properties:

trans-unit.source: Under General:
trans-unit.target: Under General:

trans-unit.source: Sign Mode
trans-unit.target: Sign Mode

trans-unit.source: **Test Sign** - Microsoft Visual Studio should sign the driver with the test certificate specified in **Test Certificate** (default).
trans-unit.target: **Test Sign** - Microsoft Visual Studio should sign the driver with the test certificate specified in **Test Certificate** (default).

trans-unit.source: If no certificate is specified in **Test Certificate** then Visual Studio will create one for the driver.
trans-unit.target: If no certificate is specified in **Test Certificate** then Visual Studio will create one for the driver.

trans-unit.source: **Note**: Windows requires all 64-bit drivers to be signed.
trans-unit.target: **Note**: Windows requires all 64-bit drivers to be signed.

trans-unit.source: **Production Sign** - Visual Studio should sign the driver with the production certificate specified in **Production Certificate**.
trans-unit.target: **Production Sign** - Visual Studio should sign the driver with the production certificate specified in **Production Certificate**.

trans-unit.source: **Off** - Visual Studio should not sign the driver with any certificate.
trans-unit.target: **Off** - Visual Studio should not sign the driver with any certificate.

trans-unit.source: Test Certificate
trans-unit.target: Test Certificate

trans-unit.source: *Blank* - No test certificate is selected (default).
trans-unit.target: *Blank* - No test certificate is selected (default).

trans-unit.source: **<Edit...>** - Selects the certificate to use when **Sign Mode** is set to **Test Sign**.
trans-unit.target: **<Edit...>** - Selects the certificate to use when **Sign Mode** is set to **Test Sign**.

trans-unit.source: Production Certificate
trans-unit.target: Production Certificate

trans-unit.source: *Blank* - No production certificate is selected (default).
trans-unit.target: *Blank* - No production certificate is selected (default).

trans-unit.source: **<Edit...>** - Selects the certificate to use when **Sign Mode** is set to **Production Sign**.
trans-unit.target: **<Edit...>** - Selects the certificate to use when **Sign Mode** is set to **Production Sign**.

trans-unit.source: TimeStampServer
trans-unit.target: TimeStampServer

trans-unit.source: **Verisign** - Use Verisign to time stamp the driver (default).
trans-unit.target: **Verisign** - Use Verisign to time stamp the driver (default).

trans-unit.source: **GlobalSign** - Use Globalsign to time stamp the driver.
trans-unit.target: **GlobalSign** - Use Globalsign to time stamp the driver.

trans-unit.source: **None** - Do not time stamp the driver.
trans-unit.target: **None** - Do not time stamp the driver.

trans-unit.source: Disable Warnings
trans-unit.target: Disable Warnings

trans-unit.source: **No** - Display warnings when signing the driver (default).
trans-unit.target: **No** - Display warnings when signing the driver (default).

trans-unit.source: **Yes** - Do not display warnings when signing the driver.
trans-unit.target: **Yes** - Do not display warnings when signing the driver.

trans-unit.source: Enable Diagnostic Verbosity
trans-unit.target: Enable Diagnostic Verbosity

trans-unit.source: **No** - Do not display diagnostic verbosity when signing the driver (default).
trans-unit.target: **No** - Do not display diagnostic verbosity when signing the driver (default).

trans-unit.source: **Yes** - Display diagnostic verbosity when signing the driver.
trans-unit.target: **Yes** - Display diagnostic verbosity when signing the driver.

trans-unit.source: File Digest Algorithm
trans-unit.target: File Digest Algorithm

trans-unit.source: *Blank* - No file digest algorithm is selected (default).
trans-unit.target: *Blank* - No file digest algorithm is selected (default).

trans-unit.source: **<Edit...>** - Select the file digest algorithm to use when signing the driver.
trans-unit.target: **<Edit...>** - Select the file digest algorithm to use when signing the driver.

trans-unit.source: Under Command Line:
trans-unit.target: Under Command Line:

trans-unit.source: Additional Options
trans-unit.target: Additional Options

trans-unit.source: Additional options to specify when signing the driver.
trans-unit.target: Additional options to specify when signing the driver.
